tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WeatherData (
  city_name VARCHAR(50),
  date DATE,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  wind_speed FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE DisasterLogs (
  event_id INT,
  city_name VARCHAR(50),
  event_date TIMESTAMP,
  event_description TEXT,
  affected_area VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE historical_weather_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  city VARCHAR(50),
  date DATE,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE weather_forecast (
  forecast_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  city VARCHAR(50),
  forecast_date DATE,
  max_temperature FLOAT,
  min_temperature FLOAT
);
